00045 // O( V + E) space requirement, neighbours can easily be accessed --> natural for exploring graphs
00046 typedef boost::adjacency_list   <           boost::vecS,                               //container representing the edge-list for each of the vertices. listS == std::list
00047                                             boost::vecS,                               //container used to represent the vertex-list of the graph. vecS == std::vector
00048                                             boost::directedS,                          //class of the graph. Options are: directedS, undirectedS, and bidirectionalS
00049                                             VertexProperties,                          //custom vertex properties
00050                                             EdgeProperties,                            //custom edge properties
00051                                             boost::no_property,                        //for specifying property storage for the graph object
00052                                             boost::listS                               //container used to represent the edge-list for the graph. listS == std::list
00053                                 >           GraphType;
00054
